content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Introduction\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our company is responsible to our customers and stakeholders for securing confidential data.\\nOne of the security measures is disk encryption.\\nDisk encryption is a technology which protects information by converting it into unreadable code that cannot be deciphered easily by unauthorized people. Disk encryption uses disk encryption software or hardware to encrypt every bit of data that goes on a disk or disk volume. Disk encryption prevents unauthorized access to data storage.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why use encryption?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disk encryption ensures that files are always stored on disk in an encrypted form. The files only become available to the operating system and applications in readable form while the system is running and unlocked by a trusted user. An unauthorized person looking at the disk contents directly, will only find garbled random-looking data instead of the actual files.\\nDisk encryption can prevent unauthorized viewing of the data when the computer or hard-disk is:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Located in a place to which non-trusted people might gain access while you are away\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Lost or stolen, as it is often the case with laptops, netbooks or external storage devices\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the repair shop\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discarded after its end-of-life\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition, disk encryption can also be used to add some security against unauthorized attempts to tamper with your operating system – for example, the installation of keyloggers or Trojan horses by attackers who can gain physical access to the system while you are away.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Warning:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disk encryption does not protect your data from all threats.\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Warning:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disk encryption also will not protect you against someone simply wiping your disk. Regular backups are recommended to keep your data safe.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some realistic situations:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nIn the following situations, encryption actually can protect you:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Protecting sensitive data if your laptop is stolen: If your laptop is stolen, encryption will prevent a thief from booting it up and looking through your sensitive data for financial information and other sensitive things. Realistically, your average laptop thief probably just wants the hardware and will probably wipe the drive quickly. But, if you have sensitive documents on your computer, encryption does make sense. The thief probably does not care about most of your data, though — photos of your parents, your music collection, and any sort of videos you might have downloaded will not be important to them.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Storing or sending sensitive data online: When storing something particularly sensitive — perhaps archives of tax documents that contain personal details like your social-security number — in online storage or emailing it to someone, you have to use encryption.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The business case: For businesses, there may be various commercial guidelines or rules requiring the use of encryption. These are intended to prevent the terrible stories we know about business laptops being stolen out of cars, and those laptops having massive databases containing millions of customer credit card numbers on them. Of course this sort of data should be encrypted. (And actually, a laptop sitting in a car should not have this sort of database on it in the first place!)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nEncryption could potentially protect your data from being searched by law enforcement, but in a serious investigation you would likely be compelled to disclose your encryption key. We are focusing on the average computer user here, not someone who has something serious to hide from law enforcement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reinforcement\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your work computers are corporate assets that may contain sensitive commercial data. To improve data security and reduce risks, we are implementing an additional security control:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disk encryption.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal Information\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"Personal information\\\" includes any information that identifies, relates to, describes, or is capable of being associated with an identified or identifiable natural person. It includes any factual or subjective information, recorded or not, about an identifiable individual. Such personal information includes, but is not limited to, an
